<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Retrieval Prism](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1032)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
<trait label="Teleportation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=156" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 176 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) A basic retrieval prism must be attuned to a PC to function._

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>command</row></row>

 

 

**Requirement** You have a free hand.
</row>

</column>

---

This triangular prism showing swirling black patterns inside constantly moves around on your armor, no matter where you affix it. As part of the process of Affixing this Talisman, you attune it to a single item of 1 Bulk or less. When you activate this talisman, the attuned item immediately teleports into your hand.

 The _retrieval prism_ can't retrieve an item that's not on your plane, including one that's in an [extradimensional](/Traits.aspx?ID=67) space like a [_bag of holding_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=249). If you haven't expended the talisman, you can attune it to a different item by Affixing the Talisman again.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Retrieval Prism
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 176 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 12 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 10"
pfs="Standard"
>
Retrieval Prism (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 176 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 200 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You don't need to attune the prism. It can retrieve any item in your possession of 1 Bulk or less, chosen when you activate the prism.
